settings.top_content_html:
It can get a little confusing when people talk about Japanese sex dolls. Many big doll companies, like WM Dolls, make sex dolls of high quality, both with Japanese and Western designs. There are also Western companies manufacturing adult dolls with Japanese features. Generally, every Japanese doll made to appear Japanese is a Japanese sex doll for the most part.

Why are Japanese sex dolls so popular?

People love exotic. There's something so fascinating about different characteristics and traditions that aren't ours. When it comes to life-size sex dolls, this is also particularly true.

Most people who buy sex dolls are searching for something they can't get at home. And one of the easiest ways to do that is to find a doll that fulfills their exotic desires.

Asian sex dolls have been around for a long time, as you know. But many consumers often feel ashamed when they ask for information on sex dolls. As if sex dolls were a taboo subject, something wrong or illegal. But the fact is that sex dolls in modern society are nowadays trendy and even more embraced.

Especially now that sex doll companies are producing super realistic dolls. In the future, we'll see life-like sex dolls with artificial intelligence. They are promising to give them more of a human-like feel. Virtual reality and technology will allow life-like love dolls to think and act as humans.

Take a look at international news or Google on the topic. There are articles on how men develop unique relationships with realistic sex dolls. And the reality is that sex dolls can bring many benefits to single men or women and even couples. Men and women buy sex dolls for photography, decoration, or modeling purposes. But they also use sex dolls as a way to experiment with fantasies without hurting their other half. And we saw couples using realistic silicone sex dolls or TPE sex dolls to spice up their marriages.

What are some unique characteristics of Japanese sex dolls?

You may be drawn to their exquisite beauty of geishas or Japanese women or Japanese girls if you have an interest in Japanese sex dolls. Created to look natural, each hair on their head, their mouth, their eyes, and much more, especially for you. Each experience was lifelike and realistic — a flexible body with movable joints that you can position as you could with an actual person.

Often, they are petite with Japanese features. Little less busty compared to their Western counterparts. It goes back to Japanese geisha or Asian women's stereotypical beauty. The kind of illusion that a doll's owner wants to meet.

Most Japanese sex dolls have their heads with large eyes. It makes them look more like popular characters from Japanese anime and manga.

Japanese sex dolls of SDG

Would you like to spend time with Japanese beauty? Our Japanese sex dolls should make it possible for you to fulfill your deepest desires. They have features that look realistic, even in the smallest details. They were flexible and long-lasting, as well. Even better, we're giving you a fantastic selection of real sex dolls. So, you can choose the one that turns you on the best.

They are made from medical-grade silicone and TPE materials. Our Japanese love dolls will keep their beautiful appearance for years. Built with a metal skeleton with flexible joints, you can put them in whatever position you want.

TPE stands for elastomer thermoplastic, also called rubber thermoplastic. A mix of plastic and rubber. Materials with properties of both thermoplastic (plastic) and elastomeric (rubber).

TPE is stretchable, and it will return to its original size. It is much softer than other materials, and due to flexibility, it can hold many positions.

Silicone is a rubber. Usually, heat-resistant and has a wide range of applications.

Silicone rubber can be very flexible or rigid and very strong. It will maintain its original shape under pressure. Due to heat resistance, it is possible to sterilize. It is inert as it does not react with most chemicals, explains their use in medical implants.

TPE pro and cons:

TPE material offers the impression of how a real person feels. Smooth and flexible, TPE is an ideal material for crafting such beautiful sex dolls.

TPE is hypoallergenic.

TPE dolls are much cheaper than their expensive counterparts. Even so, the cost of the item does not depreciate the quality it offers.

TPE is a very durable material with which you can use it for the longest time. It also allows the sex doll to stay as long as possible as brand new.

It retains moisture if not dried up, which will cause molds and bacteria build-up. TPE material is very porous.

It is sticky to the touch after washing, but the baby powder can fix that.

TPE material is also sensitive to heat; it's not possible to sterilize.

Silicone pro and cons:

Silicone is easier to cleanse or sterilize and hypo-allergenic.

Silicone material has lesser sensitivity to heat.

Silicone can keep its structure and resist weight pressure.

Silicone is a non-porous material and feels super smooth to the touch.

The silicone material is more durable than its TPE counterpart.

It feels harder than a real love doll made of TPE. If you roll them back and forth, the breast and the ass will not wobble.

Silicone sex dolls are sometimes more expensive. 

Take a look at these two for comparison: 

SUSAN - 168 CM | 5' 6" - H CUP

Made of TPE material, it has a skeleton of metal, but it bends all the limbs and body parts. Created by skilled artists and designers, these realistic dolls look very beautiful. The doll seems very natural in every detail, like a real woman. All the orifices are there, so you can try new poses and all sorts of sexual acts.

Her features:

  • Made of TPE material with a metal skeleton and movable joints
  • Hypoallergenic material
  • Customizable
  • Japanese feature, slim and shapely body
  • Attractive soft breasts, thin waist, and elastic buttocks 

ANNALISE - 153CM | 5'0" - M CUP

This Japanese silicone sex doll is very flexible, so it's possible to pose for different positions. Made of quality hypoallergenic material, so you don't have to worry about allergies. Coated in non-toxic silicone, it won't emit any unpleasant smell unless you don't clean the doll. She looks like a natural girl and is water-resistant so that you can take your new friend to the baths.

Her features:

  • Flexible, with movable joints and metal base
  •  Customizable features
  • Petite body, large breast, and Japanese anime feature
  • Silicone coating

Price range

Japanese sex dolls are unique and modern. And every year, they become more popular with their stunning bodies and features. A realistic Japanese sex doll offers a realistic feel and enjoyment.

The price does not always rely on the materials of the doll, with prices ranging from $1,500 to $ 4,000. Many companies offer very accurate customs versions with good material. Either TPE and silicone, but the look and design will not be very different from an actual person.

These adult dolls are customizable to fulfill your deepest fantasies. You can change their appearance by changing the color of their hair to their skin. Even the size of their boobs is possible to switch from c-cup to d-cup or g-cup. You can also dress them up and put some accessories on them to make them the sexy doll of your dreams. Yet, you will need to put in extra cash at the checkout. These dolls are not only sex toys, but companions and investments, they are worthy of a little extra money.

Here are some of our best Japanese Sex Dolls

JAIMIE - 150CM | 5' 0" - C CUP

This beautiful Japanese doll is from Gynoid dolls.

Jamie is a sweet, submissive doll, ready to meet all your dreams. She's got a set of big, busty breasts and a round ass you're sure to love. Jamie has very realistic proportions, unlike many other sex dolls on the market. It makes her the perfect doll to play innocent fun and raunchy. Jamie has sweet almond-shaped eyes available in a variety of colors. Make some modifications and dress her up like a geisha and create your own Jamie.

 

KATIA - 150CM | 5' 0" - C CUP

This delicate and beautiful doll is also from Gynoid dolls.

Katia is the kind of approachable doll that men and women fantasize about getting to know. She's stunning but seems like someone with whom you would have much in common — made of high-quality soft silicone with an inner skeleton of metal. It makes her soft to the touch yet capable of standing up to a lot of fun. Everything about Katia's designed to turn you on and drive you crazy. She’s kind of little, fragile doll that you can't help but want to protect and treasure.

 

MERTIE (HENTAI) - 155CM | 5' 1" - L CUP

This anime beauty is from Sino Dolls.

Mertie is a naughty Japanese troublemaker who needs discipline. Mertie’s strawberry blonde hair and feminine and curvy body makes people wild with desire. Mertie has the looks of a perfect ten winner with many guys loving the bad girl role. It's the kind of doll that, yes, you want to tease. Sino Dolls is a known sex doll manufacturer, and they know their stuff well. Mertie has some of the most authentic Japanese features from any doll. Her body is long and lean, with curves in the right places and a sexy pair of huge breasts that you want to pinch. You might be the one for you if you're looking for a great doll with a naughty side of Mertie.

 

MIKE - 170CM | 5' 5" - MALE DOLL

Mike is a Japanese sex doll from DS Dolls.

He is gorgeous, and he looks exactly like a real Japanese boy, even sexier. The attention to detail is incredible and made from materials of the highest quality. Beyond the actual quality of the doll, customization is possible. To suit your dreams, you can change about any attribute on your doll. Their petite line includes smaller types of bodies that are more submissive. It helps you to design your fantasies to create a real thing.

 

REITA - 156CM | 5' 1" - F CUP

Reita is a doll from SANHUI.

Reita is a little minx with lovely Japanese features that will impress you. Designed to fulfill all your dreams of the kinkiest character. Made with large eyes and delicate facial features and big tits, especially for you. She's a great anime sex doll, to begin with if you've watched anime for years. She gives you the chance to spend time with some of your favorite characters, both sweet and evil.

If you want to see more of our collection of these sexy Japanese and Asian life-size sex dolls, go to SDG. Add one in your wish list or proceed to check out and bring them home.

We have three secure payment options here at SDG: PayPal, credit card, and Layaway.  For further information, go to this link: https://sexdollgenie.com/pages/all-payment-options-available-at-sdg

We also deliver the dolls in discreet via FedEx. To know more about shipping and handling, returns and other fees. Please refer to this link: https://sexdollgenie.com/pages/shipping-returns

On every doll or product bought from us, we give a guarantee. We commit to providing our clients with the best customer service. Be assured that if you find any issue with any of our dolls, we are here to help you. To know more, please go to this link:  https://sexdollgenie.com/pages/genie-guarantee
settings.bottom_content_html:
Easy Customization Options:

Don't like any of the pre-configured real doll looks? Or Want your doll to be 100% unique based on your imagination and needs?

SEX DOLLS 101

 

What is a Sex Doll?

Sex dolls are a form of adult toys for aiding sexual gratification. They are also referred to as love dolls or blow-up dolls. A real-life sex doll can consist of a whole face and body, or just a head, pelvis, or other partial bodies. They come equipped with sexual stimulation accessories - artificial vagina, anus, mouth, and penis.

Many modern adult dolls and AI sex robots have vibrating and removal parts. Sex dolls exist in many ways, but they vary from sex robots with artificial intelligence, which are anthropomorphic constructs designed to show more complex interactions.

History of Sex Dolls

The historical reference to the use of sex dolls date back to 8 AD, and there are many love doll stories and research to back that up. However, it was in the sixteenth-century that Spanish and French sailors invented the most primitive sex dolls. These dolls acted as a companion for the sailors who were isolated by the ocean on long-distance journeys. They found that in some ways, it could meet the needs of their sex life - both emotionally and physically.

Later in the 17th century, Dutch sailors improved upon the design and crafted masturbatory love dolls using hand-sewn and patched cloth. These dolls were a great success among sailors from Spain, France, Germany, and other countries. 

"Crafted from stitched fabrics and old clothes, these pleasure dolls are the direct building blocks
to today's realistic sex robots and dolls."

 

Japanese 'Dutch Wives'

Thanks to the 17th-century Dutch sailors, female sex dolls became very popular among Japanese men. These dolls were mostly made of soft leather and were hand-sewn. Japan's interest in artificial life-like dolls has many stories attached to it. Creating these cloth or leather dolls was quite easy even back then. Thus anyone could make one in the privacy of their own home, with ease. To date, most Japanese people refer to modern dolls as - "Dutch wives". This alone explains the history and popularity of adult dolls in Japan.

Our range of Japanese sex dolls are crafted with love for those who understand and believe in the purity of Asian women. We make sure our dolls are able to live up to your expectations and offer you the comfort you are seeking.

 

Germany - The Birthplace of Commercial Sex Dolls!

During the 1950s, the first commercial use of full-size realistic dolls took place. And you guessed it right, the first commercial realistic adult doll was German. This sexy fashion doll was modeled to look like a comic-strip character (called Lilli) and was not penetrable. It was named - the ‘Bild Lilli doll’ and was launched in 1955. The doll remained in production until 1964.

 

Sex Dolls Enter the United States

In the 1960s, selling sex toys and devices through the mail became legal in the US. It was then that the porn magazines started featuring their ads for the first time. 

By 1980, sex dolls were available in most local sex stores, although they were the inflatable versions and could barely be reused. These inflatable sex dolls could take only a certain amount of weight. In short, they were not suitable for people of all sizes and needs. However, there was an active demand and thus the adult toy and doll manufacturers maintained a steady supply.

What Sex Doll Buyers Really Need?

The Ultimate Quest for True Love

The inevitable fall of inflatable sex dolls was probably caused by the change in the expectations of doll collectors. The need for more stimulating oral sex and anal experience grew steadily. Moreover, there was no way to connect with your sex doll that may not last longer than a month!

In the 21st century as a doll owner, many have a natural willingness to connect with their dolls. They want a companion that can be there with them for the long term. They ask for a love doll that feels more life-like and close to their imagination. This is the reason many popular sex dolls share similarities with known celebs or fashion models. 

"Enjoying a doll's company to its maximum is on every doll buyer's bucket list."

Sex dolls have effectively established themselves as a real challenge to women. Men Going Their Own Way (MGTOW) movement is not a recent phenomenon. With the aid of high-quality lifelike dolls, the community has only grown stronger over time. Restoring faith in unconditional love and care. No doubt, most doll owners take great care of their doll and treats them like princesses.

 

How TPE Sex Dolls Changed the Game?

Luckily, after 30 years of trial and error, tin-cure silicone and platinum technology were invented. They have better longevity and are less prone to damage. The first realistic love doll was made of Silicone. With that realization, Real Doll manufacturers pioneered the switching from the tin to the platinum material in June 2009. Since then, all other manufacturers have followed suit. All efforts were put into creating an adult sex doll that resembles a real woman.

"Making these silicone sex dolls available at an affordable price was still a big challenge for most doll makers."

In 2012, an alternative ThermoPlastic Elastomer known as TPE had become widely used by doll manufacturers. The cost-efficiency of TPE has made it possible to produce realistic dolls that are cheaper and affordable. On the other hand, Platinum cure silicone sex dolls are costlier. The availability of affordable premium quality dolls re-fueled the demand for life-size dolls globally.

Since then realistic TPE dolls have constantly posed as a competitor to the ones made with silicone. The great success of TPE as a preferred doll skin material is ideally responsible for the increasing demand.

 

Silicone Versus TPE love Dolls

TPE or Thermoplastic Elastomer is a mixture of plastic and rubber. TPE material can be stretched over and over and will return to its original size. It is much lighter than other materials, and it can hold multiple positions due to flexibility.

Although the material is more realistic, TPE sex dolls are a better value for money than their silicone sex doll counterparts. 

No doubt every doll collectors has her/his own taste in build, looks, and material of the sex doll. Although expensive, premium silicone dolls are still loved and enjoyed by thousands of peoples across the globe. 

Silicone is a material made of rubber. Cleaning is much easier as it is not as sticky as the Elastomer Thermoplastic. It's more costly, but also resistant to heat, stain, and water. It does not need much maintenance compared to other materials.

settings.bottom_content_html:
What is a Sex Doll Torso?

Sex doll torsos are also known as love dolls. They are synthetic human-like sex toys that have been created to provide sexual pleasure and companionship. In just about every way, they are made to look like a man or a woman. They are crafted to look incredibly amazing with the right junks put in the right places, from the curves of their bodies to their realistic-looking nipples and genitals.

Like any other full-sized sex dolls, they were made from two leading high-quality materials: TPE and Silicone.

TPE is an acronym for the thermoplastic elastomer. It is one of the most popular and widely used material to choose for real sex doll torsos and other sex toys as its soft and elastic material. TPE is an excellent material to improve a real doll's tiny details, such as mouth, nose, and genital area.

Advantages of TPE 

  • The material is perfect for makers of sex dolls to shape since it is soft and smooth to mold, and for this fact, TPE mini sex dolls will look and feel the most realistic.
  • TPE can also be very flexible, bent, stretched over and over and will remain in its original form. Those attributes make it the best material for sex dolls who look like real.
